T = int(input())
VOWELS = ['a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u']
for tc in range(T):
    string = input()
    string = [x for x in string]
    for i in range(len(string) - 2):
        chefIsFeeling = 'Sad'
        x = i + 1
        y = i + 2
        if string[i] in VOWELS and string[x] in VOWELS and (string[y] in VOWELS):
            chefIsFeeling = 'Happy'
            break
    print(chefIsFeeling)
